title: 'He cannot play left-back' - should Trafford 'stick it out' at Man City?
subtitle: James Trafford is up against one of the best in the world in Gianluigi Donnarumma, but should he stick it out as number two at Manchester City?
full_text: James Trafford is up against one of the best in the world in Gianluigi Donnarumma, but should he stick it out as number two at Manchester City?
